page.title: 09 TONI'S TYPICAL DAY.
page.content: In the morning my alarm clock wakes me at 7.00 A.M.when I get up and go for breakfast of toast, then I have a wash and get dressed.I watch "T.V.A.M." from 8.00 until 9.05.I get my bag and coat and walk to school.When I get to school we play until 9.15 when a bell rings and we go to our classrooms.Then the teacher marks the register and we go into assembly, where we sing hymns listen to a reading and say prayers. Then we do maths and after playtime English and at 12.15 we have dinner.I have a drink,sandwiches and a cake. Then we have art and then science.3.40 is home time.When I get home I have my tea and then go out to play until 7.00 p.m.We play in the wood and field and go for bicycle rides.Then we come in and watch television until 8.00.Then I have a wash and go to bed.I read until about 8.30 then I go to sleep.
